channel.title: Need 508 Command Rights Help
channel.description:
Okay well im new to 508 server i was wondering how can i change command rights
Okay the command i want to change is ::maul
heres the code
[code]} if (cmd[0].equals("maul")) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4153, 12);[/code]
How Can I Change It So Only Mods Can Spawn Em?

item.title: Need 508 Command Rights Help
item.dc:creator: @Zacmaster22 Zacmaster22
item.description:
@Zacmaster22 wrote:

ok on the commands list search for “mute” and when you find it put the command underneath it and save compile and done
